titintro: Bachelor's Degrees and Single-Cycle Master's Degrees.
intro:
Experience the UniSR atmosphere: visit our educational spaces, where theory meets practice in environments designed for excellence. 
Book your spot for practical activities and experience UniSR's hands-on teaching approach, exploring our cutting-edge facilities. 
Spots for each activity are limited: register by selecting your preferred activities and choosing a time slot to secure your place.
selectTimeSlot: Please select a time slot to register for this activity.
